      3LOAD_THE_LOADER equ false
      4SELECTED_CRTC   equ 1
      5; 
      6HEIGHT_HBL_FLASH equ 48
      7HEIGHT_HBL_MAIN equ 48+4-1+10-3-12
      8HEIGHT_HBL_HORNY equ 22
      9HEIGHT_HBL_HORNY2 equ 10+4
     10HEIGHT_HBL_HORNY3 equ 6+1
     11HEIGHT_HBL_BYTES equ 30+6-1-1
     12HEIGHT_HBL_BYTES2 equ 6-1
     13; all is displayed in &4000 page
     14;
     15SPRITE_VIDE equ &4000
     16MODE2 equ &8E
     17MODE0 equ &8C
     18R1 				equ 48
     19R2 				equ  &32 ; &32 for fullscreen
     20R2_LOGO         equ &2e-2-1
     21SCREEN_WIDTH 	equ R1*2
     22TABLINE_96 		equ END_CODE
     23TABLINE_80 		equ END_CODE+&200
     24SPRWIDTH 		equ 16
     25SPRHEIGHT       equ 48
     26WIDTH_OVERS     equ 34
     27;
     28
     29BORDER_TOP		equ 93; 68  ;69 ;&5D
     30BORDER_BOTTOM 	equ 88   ;  71 ; 
     31;
     32INK0 		equ 84 ; 88 
     33INK1 		equ BORDER_BOTTOM
     34INK1_FLASH  equ 95 ; 95
     35;INK15       equ 92
     36BLACK 		equ 84
     37;
     38COLOR1_BYTES_LOGO equ 91
     39
     40RASTER_TOP_BOTTOM equ BORDER_TOP*256+BORDER_BOTTOM ; &585D
     41RASTER_BOTTOM_TOP equ BORDER_BOTTOM*256+BORDER_TOP ; &5D58
     42RASTER_TOP_TOP    equ BORDER_TOP*256+BORDER_TOP ; &5858
     43
     44BK_MUSIC equ &c6
     45;	
     46;
     47	nolist
     48;
     49; code start in &8000
     50; 
     51	di
     52	ld hl,&c9fb
     53	ld (&0038),hl
     54	im 1
     55	ld sp, &c000
     56; 
     57 ; breakpoint
     58;
     59   ld a,i
     60
     61   cp 3
     62   jr z,CRTC_3_4_ADAPTATION
     63   cp 4
     64   jr nz,START_AFTER_CRTC_ADAPTATION
     65; 168 lines  
     66CRTC_3_4_ADAPTATION
     67;
     68; still useful?
     69; 
     70     ld a,29
     71     ld (NB_BGD_LINE1+1),a 
     72     ld a,47-30
     73     ld (NB_BGD_LINE2+1),a 
     74     ld a,61+1-30
     75     ld (NB_BGD_LINE3+1),a
     76
     77
     78  ld hl,&5aDD
     79 ld (HIDE_CORRUPTED_BYTE1+1),HL     ;  ld hl,&5aDD
     80  ld hl,&4d1d
     81 ld (HIDE_CORRUPTED_BYTE2+1),HL 
     82
     83  ld hl,&4000
     84  ld (HIDE_CORRUPTED_BYTE3+1),hl 
     85
     86
     87START_AFTER_CRTC_ADAPTATION
     88	call generate_line_fullscreen
     89	ld hl,&c000
     90	ld de,TABLINE_80+2
     91	ld (TABLINE_80),hl
     92	ld hl,TABLINE_80
     93	ld bc,510
     94	LDIR
     95
     96	call generate_line_standart
     97;	
     98;
     99
    100	ld bc,&7f00+BK_MUSIC
    101	out (c),c
    102;	
    103;	di			; coz FapInit makes heavy use of SP
    104 	   ld	a,HiFapBuff 	; High byte of the decrunch buffer address.
    105 	   ld	bc, FapPlay     ; Address of the player binary.
    106 	   ld	de, ReturnAddr  ; Address to jump after playing a song frame.
    107 	   ld	hl, FapData     ; Address of song data.
    108 	   call    FapInit
    109
    110	LD	BC,#7FC0
    111	OUT	(C),C
    112
    113 	   ei
    114;
    115	DS_SECURE_WAIT_VSYNC()
    116
    117			ld bc,&bc07		
    118			out (c),c
    119			ld bc,&bd00+&1E-2
    120			out (c),c
    121;
    122			ld bc,&bc01		
    123			out (c),c
    124			ld bc,&bd00+40
    125			out (c),c
    126;
    127			ld bc,&bc02
    128			out (c),c
    129			ld bc,&bd00+&2e
    130			out (c),c
    131
    132			ld bc,&bc06
    133			out (c),c
    134			ld bc,&bd00+21
    135			out (c),c
    136
    137
    138;
    139PREPARE_FLASH_SCREENS
    140
    141            call DISPLAY_BACKGROUND1 ; _FLASH
    142			call DISPLAY_BACKGROUND2
    143			call DISPLAY_BACKGROUND3
    144			call DISPLAY_BACKGROUND4
    145			call DISPLAY_BACKGROUND5
    146			call DISPLAY_BACKGROUND6
    147
    148			ld hl,TABLINE_96+120
    149	        ld bc,SPRITE_HL
    150	        ld a,30-5
    151			call DISPLAY_SPRITE_SHORT
    152
    153            ld hl,TABLINE_96+120
    154            ld bc,SPRITE_LR
    155            ld a,50+2+2
    156	        call DISPLAY_SPRITE_SHORT
    157
    158            ld hl,TABLINE_96+240-16+8
    159            ld bc,SPRITE_B ; SPRITELL
    160            ld a,40
    161	        call DISPLAY_SPRITE_SHORT
    162;
    163            ld hl,HBL_ZONE_02
    164            ld (ROUTINE2+1),hl
    165			ld a,84
    166	        ld (pokborder+1),a
    167
    168SEQUENCE_SPRITES_FLASH
    169;
    170; FRAME 1 = HBL for MODE 2 / MODE 0
    171;
    172STATIC_FLASH_FRAME_1
    173            DS_SECURE_WAIT_VSYNC()
    174    ;
    175 		
    176        	ld hl,ini_crtc_flash1
    177			call put_crtc
    178			ei
    179			ld bc,&7f8e
    180		    out (c),c	
    181	       	ld hl,TCOL_FLASH1
    182	     	call COLOR
    183			call PLAY_MUSIC_FAP
    184           
    185            halt
    186            halt
    187
    188			ld b,36-2-1
    189WAITF1   	defs 60,0 ; 60 Nops
    190      		djnz WAITF1 
    191            call MAIN_HBL_ZONE
    192;       
    193; FRAME 2 = MODE 1 only
    194;
    195STATIC_FLASH_FRAME_2

    897SPACEKEY_TEST
    898
    899	    LD	BC,#F40E
    900        OUT	(C),C
    901        LD	BC,#F6C0
    902        OUT	(C),C
    903;  XOR	A
    904;  OUT	(C),A
    905  		defb &ed,&71
    906        LD	BC,#F792
    907        OUT	(C),C
    908        LD	BC,#F645
    909        OUT	(C),C
    910        LD	B,#F4
    911        IN	A,(C)
    912        LD	BC,#F782
    913        OUT	(C),C
    914;  LD	BC,#F600
    915;  OUT	(C),C
    916		dec b
    917		defb &ed,&71

    961reg_crtc
    962	OUTI	
    963	INC	b

    965	OUTI	
    966	DEC	c
    967	JR	nz,reg_crtc
    968	RET

   1013PLAY_MUSIC_FAP	
   1014; 620 NOPS for INTRO
   1015		di
   1016		ld bc,&7f00+BK_MUSIC
   1017		out (c),c
   1018    	ld	(RestoreSp), sp	; Save our precious stack-pointer
   1019    	jp	FapPlay		; Jump into the replay-routine
   1020ReturnAddr:		; Return address the replay-routine will jump back to
   1021RestoreSp equ $+1
   1022
   1023    	ld	sp, 0	 	; Restore our precious stack-pointer
   1024        ei			; We may enable the maskable interrupts again
   1025  		nop
   1026		ld bc,&7fc0
   1027		out (c),c
   1028		ret

   1032SCENARIO
   1033               
   1034SCENARIO_TIMER 	ld a,1                  ; 2
   1035				dec a                   ; 1
   1036				ld (SCENARIO_TIMER+1),a ; 4
   1037				jp nz,LEAVE_SCENARIO_MANAGEMENT   ; 2
   1038;
   1039NEW_SCENARIO
   1040POS_TAB_SCE 	ld hl,TAB_SCENARIO
   1041	   		 ld a,(hl)
   1042	  		  or a
   1043		    jr nz,PAS_FIN_TAB
   1044;
   1045	 		   ld hl,TAB_SCENARIO_LOOP
   1046	  			  ld a,(hl)	
   1047PAS_FIN_TAB
   1048
   1049
   1050	    ld (SCENARIO_TIMER+1),a
   1051
   1052
   1053		inc l
   1054		ld e,(hl)
   1055	    inc l
   1056	 	 ld d,(hl)
   1057		ld (PART+1),de
   1058		inc l
   1059
   1060		ld (POS_TAB_SCE+1),hl
   1061    
   1062
   1063LEAVE_SCENARIO_MANAGEMENT
   1064
   1065;
   1066		ret
   1067;
   1068SCENARIO_SPR
   1069

   1071				dec a                   ; 1
   1072				ld (SCENARIO_SPR_TIMER+1),a ; 4
   1073				jp nz,LEAVE_SCENARIO_SPR_MANAGEMENT   ; 2
   1074;
   1075NEW_SCENARIO_SPR
   1076POS_TAB_SCE_SPR 	ld hl,TAB_SCENARIO_SPR
   1077	   		 ld a,(hl)
   1078	  		  or a
   1079		    jr nz,PAS_FIN_TAB_SPR
   1080;
   1081	 		   ld hl,TAB_SCENARIO_SPR
   1082	  			  ld a,(hl)	
   1083      	;	  jr PAS_FIN_TAB+7	
   1084;
   1085PAS_FIN_TAB_SPR
   1086
   1087
   1088	    ld (SCENARIO_SPR_TIMER+1),a
   1089;
   1090		inc l
   1091		ld e,(hl)
   1092	    inc l
   1093	 	 ld d,(hl)
   1094		ld (ROUTINE_DISPLAY_HEART+1),de
   1095		inc l
   1096		ld (POS_TAB_SCE_SPR+1),hl
   1097    
   1098
   1099LEAVE_SCENARIO_SPR_MANAGEMENT
   1100
   1101;
   1102		ret
